results.title: #101a  RH1.6 game dev.  still with Baliverna
results.description:
stream time
-22:30h...  UTC+01:00
Making of the game Rest House
Description:
“All wrong.” Game consists of five stories that are interconnected with mysterious characters and events. The main character is trying to discover the meaning each of them. He gets sucked in the events that will lead him to the strange places where he meets strange people, fairy tale creatures and landscapes. more info at: 

[markokacanski.com](http://www.markokacanski.com "markokacanski.com")

support

results.title: # Answering Boost Questions Daily
results.description:
I tend to answer a few semi-challenging C++ questions on http://stackoverflow.com as a finger exercise today.

My SO user is (surprise) "sehe".

I figured streaming it would be nice to

 * show you the thought process and plan of attack to solving random, smallish issues (what documentation, what tests, how do we create a SSCCE etc.)

 * help me keep the focus (and not get lost in a chat/youtube/reddit/whatever)

results.title: C#/MonoGame - RTS Sketching
results.description:
Hi! My name is Andreas, 30, you can also call me Corpse, Zet or ZetItUp which ever fits you. I've been programming on and off since i was 14 and thought that i would try and stream some of it now!

On the stream you will mostly see me working on the game Alien Prisoner.
I will do programming and graphics on the stream.

Latest Alpha Build:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxLakwKE55TlUUlfeXBqbjkybkU/view?usp=sharing

Requires OpenAL:
https://www.openal.org/downloads/

results.title: Create tchat
results.description:
Salutation ! Sur ce stream, je vais développer un **tchat**
La durée de création est encore approximative.

Vous verrez donc du **HTML5** - **CSS**, **Javascript** / **JQuery**, du **PHP** et du **MySQL.**

En premier lieu, je vais m'occuper du design.

results.title: eCommerce Laravel Site
results.description:
In these streams I'll be making an eCommerce site using Laravel and various packages.

Among the things we'll be using aside from Laravel include:

- [Laravel-uuid](https://github.com/webpatser/laravel-uuid) for non-enumerable product id's
- [Laravel-Cart](https://github.com/moltin/laravel-cart) for a shopping-cart system
- [Vue.js](http://vuejs.org) as an front-end MVVM framework
- [Behat](http://behat.org) as a BDD Framework
- [phpSpec](http://phpspec.readthedocs.org/en/latest/) as a TDD Framework
- [Agolia](https://www.algolia.com) for cloud-based real time searching

OS: Linux Mint
Virtual Hypervisor: VMWare Worksation
IDE: Sublime Text 3 (With Material Design Theme)

Any questions, feel free to ask!

results.title: Final Generic Shooter Update Polish Pass
[GER] OctoAwesome Xmas-Marathon (Replay)
results.description: OctoAwesome ist ein Experiment. Es ist ein Let's Code für Spiele-Entwickler, die mit Tom zusammen ein richtig, richtig cooles Projekt mit unbekanntem Ausgang entwickeln wollen. In täglichen 20 Minuten Videos bauen wir gemeinsam an einem spannenden Projekt. Durch Kommentare, Feedback und sonstigen Vorschlägen lässt sich das Projekt noch im Laufe der Video-Reihe beeinflussen. Schreib deine Meinung und Wünsche in die Video-Kommentare oder hier ins Forum.
results.tags: microsoft c# 2d 2d games 3d 2d games monogame minecraft

results.title: Learning C++ with Programming Challenges
results.description:
I'm learning C++ with programming Challenges from the LIO - Luxembourgish Informatics Olympiad (yes, that is a thing). I'm a beginner in C++ and in competitive coding so feel free to help me out. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask them.

If you want to learn more about competitive coding, check out:
https://www.topcoder.com/
https://projecteuler.net/
https://uva.onlinejudge.org/
https://icpc.baylor.edu/
https://www.codechef.com/
...

Or those books:
Programming Challenges - The Programming Contest Training Manual
Competitive Programming 3

I speak English, German & French so feel free to write in any of those languages!

results.title: #nodejs #reactjs codepix.io development
results.description:
We're using three technology layers for this project.

#1 - a nodejs express server compiled from babel, using mocha/chai unit testing and typing with flowType.  

https://github.com/MattMcFarland/codepix-server

- babel
- mocha
- chai
- express
- eslint
- coveralls

#2 - client layer

#3 - application layer
- bundles server client libraries and faces production

results.title: playing https://www.stockfighter.io - no mic
results.description:
Currently streaming closp web framework.

Closp is a web framework similar to JHipster but for the clojure / clojurescript stack.

I am a Senior Software Engineer proficient in several languages and frameworks. I have a diploma in computer science and live to learn. So if you have anything to chat about, just go ahead.

results.title: Pot Luck ;-)   Maybe Chat about Coding!
results.description:
Currently working on releasing the Jegas Application Server; its a CRM, a Web-server, Organizer, Project Management tool, and much more. I make sure the interface is decent - but I spend most of my time making sure people can trust this system to run their business, organization, church, whatever. 

You might find me working with Linux, working on a game, testing play my own game creations, I do a lot of expert level stuff...but I'm no expert!

Who knows what will be going on... Hope you like it whatever it is!

results.title: Tiled Map Editor
results.description:
Dakkra Streams
==================
I love programming and have always been interested in multimedia. Thus, live streaming programming and related activities is a massive win and joy for me!

I usually program in Java but recent;y have been learning c++, python, ruby, and nodejs to integrate well with other technologies. 

Tiled Map Editor
--------------
This is a practice editor as I explore what possibilities i have for creating environments. Eventually i'll want to import the maps into a game with libGDX as a backend... somehow

Communication
------------------
Feel free to chat in the LCTV chat box or to send me a message on Skype! If i'm streaming with my microphone I may even accept Skype calls
